setting.title: Worksapce Member Settings
setting.roleDesc: Promoting to Manager means that this member can invite other members create groups etc. However only Masters have access to edit payment and Workspace profile settings.
setting.givePlansDesc: Allocate plans for your new Workspace members.

message.updateFail: Failed to update member details from the Workspace please try again later

kick.title: Remove member from Workspace
kick.desc: The selected members are removed from your Workspace. They are no longer be able to use Workspace-related products and services. Removed members can be invited again.

message.kickFail: Failed to remove Workspace member please try again later

password.title: Reset Password
password.desc: Reset the password for the selected workspace account.
password.caution: Password should be within 8-20 characters in uppercase and lowercase letters/numbers/special characters (.,!,@,#,$,%)

message.fail:
Failed to change password. 
Please try again later.

delete.desc:
Delete the selected member's account. 
Data uploaded from the deleted account will not be deleted. Account-related information will be deleted. 
Deleted data cannot be recovered.

message.fail:
Account deletion failed. 
Please try again later.
message.successContent: The selected account has been deleted.

delete.title: Delete account

add.title: Add Member
add.desc: Would you like other users to use VIRNECT products and services together?
add.desc2: Invite VIRNECT users to your Workspace
add.desc3: You can Invite VIRNECT users as Workspace members. Purchase plans in advance from "Payment Center" and allocate them to your new members.
add.emailDesc: Please enter the VIRNECT member's email address of the person you want to invite and send an invitation. By accepting your invitation the member can become one of your Workspace member and use products together.

message.inviteFail: Failed to invite a member to Workspace please try again later
message.notHaveAnyPlan: At least one plan must be allocated when inviting new Workspace members.
message.enoughPlan: No plans available to assign to Workspace members please purchase plans and invite them again.
message.memberOverflow: Please note that total of 49 users including the "Master" member may participate the "Public service". Please change your plans if you need more members to use our products and services.
message.workspaceOverflow: In Public Service one user can participate in up to 9 Workspaces. To join the selected Workspace please make yourself available first by leaving one of the Workspace you are in and request an invitation email to the Workspace master member.
message.memberAlready: This member is already being participated in your Workspace.
message.noHavePlans: There are no remaining plans available. Please go to the payment center and purchase the plans.

create.title: Add workspace member
create.idPlaceholder: Please enter the ID of the account to be created.
create.passwordPlaceholder: Please enter the password for the account to be created.

caution.createId:
Enter your ID and password to create a new workspace member account. 
<u>You must assign at least one plan you have when creating an account</u>.
caution.validId: <u>ID</u> consists of 4-20 characters consisting of alphabets, numbers, and special characters.
caution.validPassword: <u>Password</u> should be within 8-20 characters in uppercase and lowercase letters/numbers/special characters (.,!,@,#,$,%)
caution.canModify: When creating an account, the registered password and account information can be changed by the logged-in user.

message.successContent:
Account creation is complete with the information you entered. 
You can use the service with the created account. 
To protect your account, please guide users to change their password and set up password forgotten questions and answers.
message.idDuplicated:
This ID is already registered. 
Please enter a different ID.
message.notHaveAnyPlan: At least one product plan must be assigned to the account you are creating.
message.fail:
Member addition failed. 
Please try again later. 
If the same problem recurs, contact your network administrator.
